website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option that comes in a variety of flavors and cuts by a trusted, well-known brand. Most dogs love the flavors, and their owners love the reasonable price.
pros: Inexpensive canned dog food by one of the most recognizable brands in pet food
100% nutritionally complete with essential vitamins and minerals
Available in several variety packs to suit different canine taste preferences, including Prime Cuts, Beef Lovers, Gravy Cravers, and Chop House
cons: Some reports of damaged cans upon arrival
Pull tabs have been known to break off when opening them

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great Gravy along with the Chop House
customer_reviews.text: I take a can of this and ta Can of the Chop House which is the one that looks like ground Beef. Put both in a container and add around 1/4 more of Water. Shake vigorously. Then I spoon it on as Gravy on top of my Dogs Diamond Dry Dog Food. As soon as I start stirring it, my American Bull Dog starts barking, then she starts jumping around with enthusiasm and proceeds to Wolf Down the food. The way I figure it the dry dog food gives her the nutrition and the gravy makes it taste delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Winn

customer_reviews.title: So far it's been eaten the Gravy is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Picky eaters seem to like it and I have tried all kinds, the problem is they like everything for a while, then they don't, so time will tell. They liked others more expensive and healthier but then didn't but I think they like the gravy in this. They probably just get tired of the same food day after day wouldn't you?
customer_reviews.author: CCB

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this stuff, and it seems very healthy for him.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food, I mix it with his Beneful, and if I add a little warm water, it makes a gravy that coats the entire serving of dry food. I noticed the other day how shiny his coat is, he looks much healthier than when I first brought him home from the animal shelter. His eyes are very bright, too. I really think it is having a positive effect on him, and he seems to really enjoy the flavors. So, we are happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa in SLO

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Canned Meaty Dog Food.
customer_reviews.text: This is good quality canned dog food that we often give to our two older Lady Dogs. They enjoy it mixed with a portion of cooked brown rice or left over pasta . the flavorful gravy appeals to their natural appetite for left over "human food." We offer the Girls a variety of flavors, Chicken,Beef, and even Lamb cooked with a little rice.. We give them just enough to satisfy their craving for meat, but not so much that they no longer want their portion of healthy dry dog food. Good quality dog food, at a reasonable price. I am grateful that it is available on Amazon, as we no longer can travel very far to shop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the same as you buy in the store ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the same as you buy in the store BUT they are repackaging all their dented cans into a case. So if you are concerned about buying dented cans don't buy this. It is also heavy on chicken. I am giving it three stars because if every can is dented in some way you should be informed of that before you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Another thing was sometimes the easy peel back top would loose it's handle and we ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I gave these to my dogs puppy's after she lost interest in them, mixed in with puppy formula. It did work for a while but sometimes they would throw it up or get diarrhea. Another thing was sometimes the easy peel back top would loose it's handle and we couldn't open the can. One of my older dogs got into the food and puked all over everywhere. So I'm not sure if it was the food or the dogs. But this food did have artificial ingredients in it. I wouldn't recommend it, but it was good for the price for 9 puppy's on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Shopicorn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I mix about a 1/3 can with 2 cups of dry dog food in-order to add some additional flavor that my German Shepard loves. No problems with my dog digesting and poop staying together. Been buying these for over 6 mos now and no problems with product.
customer_reviews.author: Gone247

customer_reviews.title: Good "topper" on boring dry food
customer_reviews.text: The senior-citizen dog in my household has eaten just dry food his whole life, but lately when I put his food bowl down he's been giving me a look like "Plain pellets? Again?" I've started giving him about 1/3 can of this Alpo along with his regular food, and he's right back to feeling excited about dinner time. Love the easy pop-top: no can opener needed! The fact that it's "meat chunks" instead of "ground meat" makes it easy to scoop out a portion and mix into dry food. Not sure I'd ever go all-Alpo for my dog's diet, but it's great for enticing older or finicky dogs to eat up.
customer_reviews.author: LegoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Comparable Price - Unmatched Convenience.
customer_reviews.text: Price is comparable to local grocery store but the added convenience of delivery - my dog loves these and 1 can is the perfect size for a serving. Comes with 2 flavors and both smell oddly attractive - not like dog food at all. There are good sized chunks of meat in a gravy in both styles with the lamb version including rice for what appears to be nice, hearty meals. My dog likes both styles showing no preference towards either flavor.
customer_reviews.author: BMUR

customer_reviews.title: not a bite
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my aging Lab but she would not touch it, not a bite. Also tried another Alpo canned food, same results. I always had stuck to the higher priced brands which she ate a little of so I thought she might like this cheaper brand. No luck.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchy

customer_reviews.title: ALPO Prime Cuts Dog Food Variety Pack, 9.90-Pound, Pack of 12
customer_reviews.text: It's good enough for stray dogs I take care of, I can't watch them going hungry. People are so mean to them poor dogs get alot of drop off here.. I like animals more than I do people, they have a right to live like us. AMEN
customer_reviews.author: Janice Moore

customer_reviews.title: I buy 5 flats a month or 60 cans for ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy 5 flats a month or 60 cans for my (from Germany) female German Shepherd she usually is finicay but not with this & is less expensive than walmarts a win win if you ask me
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Says This Tastes Great.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves Prime Cuts. My dog has dry food available all day (she does not overeat). So...for dinner...I give her a potion of the can (about 1/3). It gets her hungry enough to eat her dry dog food. I do not mix it with the dry food because she may not eat it all and then I need to clean out her bowl (don't want wet food sitting around all day). I don't like giving my dog wet dog food, but Prime Cuts is a sort of treat before she eats her dry food (which she does).
customer_reviews.author: Carol DeVico

customer_reviews.title: Also Canned Dog Food.
customer_reviews.text: My dog ate this his entire life. Unfortunately he passed away from old age last Friday. 8/2/19. I have fed all 9 of my dogs this for 35 years. They all loved it, and lived healthy lives into their teens. I will definitely be starting my next Turkic on this when I get them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Honey loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small dog that is a rescue and she is a bit odd on what she first can and then will eat. She mostly needs wet food or small kibble as she only has a few teeth and then is picky about the foods she can have from that point :) I've tried all kinds of different foods but this one is a favorite and she literally won't eat what she does not like so while I posted this, the stars are from Honey :)
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not his flavor
customer_reviews.text: My dog just will not touch this no matter if i heat it up or mix it he will not eat it sorry. But the gravy cravers he love's it so i will only be getting him the gravy flavored dog food.
customer_reviews.author: PRamirez

customer_reviews.title: I can make sure that he always has a good stock on hand
customer_reviews.text: my dog really enjoys the different flavors of PPC. for the price, and the ease on my wallet, I can make sure that he always has a good stock on hand. I like to make sure that my dog gets food with no fillers, no ingredients that I can't pronounce, and that can cost me. Alpo gives me a great product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog very sick
customer_reviews.text: Made my dog sick, had to take him to emergency room for extreme gas. Next day and $700 later he's still not back to his old self. I thought Alpo was a brand you could trust,
customer_reviews.author: D. Mazzone

customer_reviews.title: Alpo canned was already my 1st choice...
customer_reviews.text: I feed Alpo canned anyway- he likes it and it's a good product. What got me was partly the price ( lower than local) and partly delivery-to-door. Stuff has happened to me and lifting/carrying is iffy at best. Now I just drag the box into the house and I can distribute the cans at my leisure, saving my lift/carry budget for other things- like taking laundry upstairs. There are two "flavors" in the case. Also good because while some variety is good, for dogs' digestion too much change is not. If you know your dog likes Alpo can, by all means- take advantage of this. Even better if you have Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Dog food my dogs will actually eat.
customer_reviews.text: I assume the flavor of this dog food is good. I haven’t tasted it myself, but my dogs enjoy it. Keeps their fur shine and smooth. I wonder if it would have the same effect on my hair if I ate a half a can twice a day. Anyone tried this?
customer_reviews.author: Chaptastic

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love
customer_reviews.text: Our Huskies love this food and can't get enough. I give them each one can a day and it's gone in about 5 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Smith

customer_reviews.title: Alpo Prime Cuts
customer_reviews.text: Our dog Lady is 18 years old and loves only the Alpo Prime cuts. She is starting to be more active after eating them too. I have tried more expensive brands and she does not eat them . This is favew and thanks to Amazon for delivering it so fast .She never runs out.
customer_reviews.author: danny devito

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding this brand to my dogs since they were puppies, they eat it with relish & it is good for them. Their annual check up is always good. I plan to continue feeding this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. Carden

customer_reviews.title: Like getting it delivered to my door
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes the flavor and gets one bite with her dry food. Like the idea of having it delivered.

customer_reviews.text: My dog likes this brand of dog food it’s the only one I buy all flavors

customer_reviews.title: Not 22oz can
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it because of thinking it is 22oz can. Went back to look at description, finally i did find it in description that is put in a not very noticeable way. But I tried to look for other information like fat %, protein %, no where I can see it. Paid 2 bucks more for this product. Couldn't find info to show i get it is worth.

customer_reviews.title: Great doggie food
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can mix this wet food with my dogs dry food

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Our dog likes it. We mix it half and half with dry food. good value

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Upon the click of the can opening, in an instant, 2 Giant Schnauzers in a flash, are right here licking their chops & ready to eat. The aroma bring them in nothing flat The aroma is not unappealing kind to the nose & dissipates rapidly. The content amount is just right. The meaty texture mixes well with kibble. Good news for us.... the price is at par with local suppliers & grocers. Ordering more now
customer_reviews.author: DGF

customer_reviews.title: Dogs can't get enough
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love lamb and rice food, but it is hard to find locally. This is the perfect thing for them.

customer_reviews.title: My little Boston Terrier girlie-dog loves this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: My little 25 pound Boston Terrier loves this food. I give her half a can in the morning and the rest in the evening along with a package of Purina "Moist and Meaty Burger" which she will eat if she is still hungry. She would eat as much of the Alpo as I would give her. She's been eating this most of her life and is still racing around like a little pup. Keep up the good work, Alpo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm mmmm Good Wag Wag

And most importantly, my dogs don't get sick or diarrhea from it.

customer_reviews.title: Chunks of meat rather than a glob of unidentified mush, good. for enticing a sick dog to eat
customer_reviews.text: I keep this on hand for emergencies or really sick dogs who don't want to eat, to hide medication in, or rescue dogs in a bind. It's not the high quality organic dog food I feed my own dogs every day, but it's a reasonable food for the needs mentioned above. There are actually chunks of meat in the cans rather than just a glob of congealed yuck and I have never had a dog react badly to a half can mixed in with their regular food every now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs & Horses

customer_reviews.title: Used as an add-on to more expensive dog food.

product_meta.title: Purina ALPO Gravy Wet Dog Food Variety Pack, Prime Cuts With Beef & With Lamb & Rice - (12) 13.2 oz. Cans
product_meta.description: Stock up on more of the flavors that gets your dog excited about mealtime with this Purina ALPO Prime Cuts wet dog food variety pack. Two irresistible recipes deliver the meaty goodness he loves, and real beef or lamb in each can lets you rest easy knowing he's getting meals made with high-quality ingredients. Each steakhouse-inspired variety features a rich, savory gravy to tempt his taste buds, and 23 essential vitamins and minerals in every serving support his overall health and wellness. The tender chunks give this wet dog food a tempting texture your canine can happily sink his teeth into, and each recipe contains high-quality sources of protein, so you can feel good about the delicious foods you put in his bowl every day. Give your dog the 100% complete and balanced nutrition for adult dogs he needs along with the flavors he craves every time you serve up a selection from this scrumptious variety pack.
